title: Kara Combs
text:
Engineer & PhD candidate (Industrial & Systems Engineering, OR). I work on explainable AI for hyperspectral anomaly detection, analogical reasoning, and knowledge graphs.

Email: your.email@example.com

GitHub: https://github.com/karacombs

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/YOUR-LINKEDIN




Sept 2025: Launched this website on GitHub Pages using Quarto.
Summer 2025: Working on explainable AI for hyperspectral anomaly detection.





Contextual Analogical Inference — methods integrating textual triples, causal structure, and KG embeddings.
Robust Entity Extractor — resilient IE for story-like text.

See the Projects page for more.

title: Projects
text:
A sampling of ongoing and past work.

Contextual Analogical Inference (CAI)

Integrates textual triples, causal/temporal structure, and KG embeddings for long-text reasoning.



Robust Entity Extractor

Entity & relation extraction tailored to story-like narratives with noisy context.
